attributes.action: Frederick P. Burns Petition The Prime Minister To Dismiss The Home Secretary Immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary Ms J. Smith by her own admission has misappropriated some £116,000 of the Tax Payers Money.Ordinary Rank and File Civil Servants or Private Sector Employees using the same procedures to gain finantially in the same way are guaranteed to find themselves brought before the Courts Charged with Theft by Thier Employer.Ms J.Smith as Home Secretary is not exempt from the Law of the Land as it Applies to One and All.

rejection.details: There is currently an investigation in process on this issue, and MPs' expenses is a matter for Parliament, not the government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
